name: hashtag-include
tagline: we build shit software | bad at everything
body:
### Hey there..

hashtag-include is a group of devs who write _terrible, awful_ software. But some people like (hell, they even use) it.

## Who?

Well that's easy. [@b3ngr33ni3r](https://twitter.com/b3ngr33ni3r) and [@trjast](https://twitter.com/trjast).

## Why?

Why not?
